description: Single storey front extension at No. 312 Elveden Road to provide a total of 446sqm in B2 use class; removal of sliding shutter door and addition of three loading bays at No. 187 Twyford Abbey Road
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plan: P203 (Rev: A), P204, P205 (Received: 04/08/2015) and Proposed Servicing Arrangement Option 1 (Rev: A).  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the existing materials and those described in the plans. 	 Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies LV 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1 (g), 1.2 (f) and 2.10 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan Consolidated (2015). | The rating noise level emitted from external plant, as assessed under BS4142: 2014, shall not exceed the existing background noise level, as measured from the nearest sensitive facades during the relevant periods of operation.  Reason: In the interests of the amenity of occupants of nearby noise sensitive uses, and in accordance the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policy 7A, policies 1.1(j) of the Adopted Ealing Development (Core) Strategy 2012 and London Plan (2015) policy 7.15.
